Text: PRC Supervisor Verifications Cc You will be receiving a report that contains a list of all of your direct reports via inter company mail Please take a moment to review your list to ensure that we have included everyone for PRC purposes In the event that you need to make changes please do so on the report itself and return it to my assistant Ramona Perkins at EB B by May You may also contact Ramona directly at ext to make any updates via telephone If you do choose to call her please go ahead and forward your updated report back to her Thank you Kathy Mosley HR Manager
